title: Contemporary Diamond Vaddanam Pendant - Navya Haram Chandrani
materials: G Color). Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This pendant features a crescent moon (Chandrani) design, traditionally associated with auspicious beginnings. The delicate teardrop design is encrusted with sparkling diamonds in a pave setting. It's a contemporary take on the traditional Vaddanam design, perfect for those seeking a blend of classic and modern.
occasions: or as a special gift. It can be paired with a gold chain or pearl mala for a traditional look or worn on a delicate gold chain for a modern style. Perfectly suitable for a Sangeet or Reception
description: A unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The brilliant-cut diamonds offer exceptional sparkle and fire. The pendant's lightweight design ensures comfortable wear throughout the day or evening. Made with the highest quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship.
